remarks: Splitting for structure powers 4: maps isomorphically onto the other half.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwssplit4.e $e |- E = ( R ^s ( A u. B ) ) $.
pwssplit4.g $e |- G = ( Base ` E ) $.
pwssplit4.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
pwssplit4.k $e |- K = { y e. G | ( y |` A ) = ( A X. { .0. } ) } $.
pwssplit4.f $e |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x |` B ) ) $.
pwssplit4.c $e |- C = ( R ^s A ) $.
pwssplit4.d $e |- D = ( R ^s B ) $.
pwssplit4.l $e |- L = ( E |`s K ) $.
pwssplit4 $p |- ( ( R e. LMod /\ ( A u. B ) e. V /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> F e. ( L LMIso D ) ) $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d E x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d K x $.
$d L x $.
$d R x y $.
$d V x y $.
